text: Atherton is an incorporated town in San Mateo County, California, United States. At the 2020 census, 7,188 people lived there. Atherton is one of the richest cities in the United States, and is regularly ranked among the most expensive ZIP codes in the country. It was founded in 1923. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Towns in California Category:Settlements in San Mateo County, California
title: Atherton, California
